title: MLCommons Cognata Dataset Download
license_notice: The MLCommons Cognata dataset is provided to MLCommons Members for use in MLPerf benchmarks under the terms of this end-user license agreement.

datasets.name: cognata-dataset-full
datasets.title: Cognata Dataset (Full)
datasets.description: Complete Cognata dataset including processed and raw assets for all benchmarks using Cognata dataset.

datasets.name: calib_2d
datasets.title: 2D Object Detection Calibration Dataset
datasets.description: Calibration data for 2D object detection ABTF benchmark using SSD-ResNet50.

datasets.name: val_2d
datasets.title: 2D Object Detection Validation Dataset
datasets.description: Validation data for Cognata 2D object detection ABTF benchmark using SSD-ResNet50.

datasets.name: ssd_checkpoint_pth
datasets.title: SSD-ResNet50 Model Checkpoint (.pth)
datasets.description: Baseline model checkpoint for 2D object detection.

datasets.name: ssd_checkpoint_onnx
datasets.title: SSD-ResNet50 Model (ONNX)
datasets.description: ResNet50 ONNX model for 2D object detection.

datasets.name: calib_seg
datasets.title: Semantic Segmentation Calibration Set
datasets.description: Calibration data for ABTF semantic segmentation benchmark using DeepLabv3+.

datasets.name: val_seg
datasets.title: Semantic Segmentation Validation Set
datasets.description: Validation data for ABTF semantic segmentation benchmark using DeepLabv3+.

datasets.name: deeplab_onnx
datasets.title: Deeplabv3+ Model (ONNX)
datasets.description: Static Deeplabv3+ ONNX model for segmentation benchmark.

datasets.name: deeplab_dynamic_onnx
datasets.title: Deeplabv3+ Dynamic Model (ONNX)
datasets.description: Dynamic Deeplabv3+ ONNX model for segmentation benchmark. Useful if input images have different resolutions
